MemberSignature.Value: public static float ApplyDimension (Android.Util.ComplexUnitType unit, float value, Android.Util.DisplayMetrics metrics);
.method public static hidebysig float32 ApplyDimension(valuetype Android.Util.ComplexUnitType unit, float32 value, class Android.Util.DisplayMetrics metrics) cil managed
static member ApplyDimension : Android.Util.ComplexUnitType * single * Android.Util.DisplayMetrics -> single

Docs.param: The unit to convert from.
The value to apply the unit to.
Current display metrics to use in the conversion -- supplies display density and scaling information.
Docs.summary: Converts an unpacked complex data value holding a dimension to its final floating point value.
Docs.returns: The complex floating point value multiplied by the appropriate metrics depending on its unit.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string CoerceToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Regardless of the actual type of the value, try to convert it to a string value.
Docs.returns: CharSequence The coerced string value. If the value is null or the type is not known, null is returned.

Docs.param: A complex data value holding a unit, magnitude, and mantissa.
Current display metrics to use in the conversion -- supplies display density and scaling information.
Docs.summary: Converts a complex data value holding a dimension to its final value as an integer pixel offset.
Docs.returns: The number of pixels specified by the data and its desired multiplier and units.

Docs.param: A complex data value holding a unit, magnitude, and mantissa.
Current display metrics to use in the conversion -- supplies display density and scaling information.
Docs.summary: Converts a complex data value holding a dimension to its final value as an integer pixel size.
Docs.returns: The number of pixels specified by the data and its desired multiplier and units.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig float32 ComplexToFloat(int32 complex) cil managed

Docs.param: A complex data value.
Docs.summary: Retrieve the base value from a complex data integer.
Docs.returns: A floating point value corresponding to the complex data.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static float ComplexToFraction (int data, float base, float pbase);
.method public static hidebysig float32 ComplexToFraction(int32 data, float32 base, float32 pbase) cil managed
static member ComplexToFraction : int * single * single -> single

Docs.param: A complex data value holding a unit, magnitude, and mantissa.
The base value of this fraction. In other words, a standard fraction is multiplied by this value.
The parent base value of this fraction. In other words, a parent fraction (nn%p) is multiplied by this value.
Docs.summary: Converts a complex data value holding a fraction to its final floating point value.
Docs.returns: The complex floating point value multiplied by the appropriate base value depending on its unit.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Density : int with get, set

Docs.summary: If the Value came from a resource, this holds the corresponding pixel density.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: If #density is equal to this value, then the density should be treated as the system's default density value: DisplayMetrics#DENSITY_DEFAULT.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: If #density is equal to this value, then there is no density associated with the resource and it should not be scaled.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return the data for this value as a float.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
